settings.subtitle: Meet the Maker
settings.title: Maria's Ceramics Studio
settings.content:
In her sun-filled studio in Oaxaca, Mexico, Maria continues a family tradition spanning four generations. Each piece is hand-formed using local clay and fired in a traditional wood kiln.

"My grandmother taught me that clay has memory. It remembers every touch, every intention. That's why I take my time with each piece."
